[[index]]

VDirSyncer Configuration [~/.vdirsyncer/config]
-----------------------------------------------

[general]
status_path = "~/.vdirsyncer/status/"

[pair calendars]
a = "cal_local"
b = "cal_remote"
collections = ["from a", "from b"]
metadata = ["color"]

[storage cal_local]
type = "filesystem"
path = "~/.calendars/"
fileext = ".ics"

[storage cal_remote]
type = "caldav"
url = "https://caldav.fastmail.com/"
username = "travis@fastmail.org"
password = ""

[pair contacts]
a = "contacts_local"
b = "contacts_remote"
collections = ["from a", "from b"]

[storage contacts_local]
type = "filesystem"
path = "~/.contacts/"
fileext = ".vcf"

[storage contacts_remote]
type = "carddav"
url = "https://carddav.fastmail.com/"
username = "travis@fastmail.org"
password = ""
